bibl.title: Or Such as Ovid's Metamophoses ...
bibl.note: Examines the intertextual relationship between the Catalogue and Ovid's Metamorphoses. - Exemplary mythography. - Excessive mythography: Arachne's labor. - Selective mythography: Nestor's gratia. - Repetitive mythography: Hercules' labores. - Hercules' Rome.

bibl.title: The Hesiodic Catalogue of Women. Constructions and Reconstructions

bibl.seg: FLETCHER Richard, Or Such as Ovid's Metamophoses ...
Richard HUNTER (Ed.), The Hesiodic Catalogue of Women. Constructions and Reconstructions (Cambridge, 2005) pp. 299-319.

Examines the intertextual relationship between the Catalogue and Ovid's Metamorphoses. - Exemplary mythography. - Excessive mythography: Arachne's labor. - Selective mythography: Nestor's gratia. - Repetitive mythography: Hercules' labores. - Hercules' Rome.
